thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: Gasoline Prices Fall in Wake of EPA Deal With Bankrupt Refiner

author: Alison Sider
title: Gasoline Prices Fall in Wake of EPA Deal With Bankrupt Refiner
text:
Gasoline futures sank Tuesday with traders saying the main reason was a deal to ease a bankrupt refiner’s obligation to buy credits to comply with environmental regulation.
Philadelphia Energy Solutions, a major East Coast refiner, and the Environmental Protection Agency on Monday struck a deal as part of the company’s bankruptcy proceedings, slashing the number of renewable-fuel credits the company needs to buy.
That...
